body_html:
Try this:

initial_state = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMStateTuple([tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(o, multiplier=10) for o in encoder_state])

Because encoder_state is a LSTMStateTuple, so you can't simply tile a tuple, but tile every element in a tuple, then pack it as LSTMStateTuple.
body_text:
Try this:
initial_state = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMStateTuple([tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(o, multiplier=10) for o in encoder_state])

Because encoder_state is a LSTMStateTuple, so you can't simply tile a tuple, but tile every element in a tuple, then pack it as LSTMStateTuple.
body:
Try this:
```
initial_state = tf.nn.rnn_cell.LSTMStateTuple([tf.contrib.seq2seq.tile_batch(o, multiplier=10) for o in encoder_state])
```
Because encoder_state is a LSTMStateTuple, so you can't simply tile a tuple, but tile every element in a tuple, then pack it as LSTMStateTuple.
